AREA VIII: PHYSICAL PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER G:
STUDENT CENTER
SYSTEM-INPUTS AND
PROCESSES
S.1. The institution has a Student
Center with supplies and
materials.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

AREA VIII: PHYSICAL PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER G:
STUDENT CENTER

S.2. Policies and guidance on the
proper utilization of Student
Center are in place.

AREA VIII: PHYSICAL PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER G:
STUDENT CENTER
SYSTEM-INPUTS AND

S.4. A conference room is available
for students’ use.

PARAMETER G:

S.5. There are facilities and
equipment for table games,
music appreciation, and TV or
video viewing.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

AREA VIII: PHYSICAL PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER G:

SYSTEM-INPUTS AND
PROCESSES
S.6. Clean and sanitary toilets, for
men separate from those of
women are available.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

AREA VIII: PHYSICAL PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER G:
STUDENT CENTER
SYSTEM-INPUTS AND
PROCESSES
S.7. Toilet fixtures for students with
special needs and PWD’s are
provided.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus

AREA VIII: PHYSICAL PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER G:

SYSTEM-INPUTS AND

S.8. There are offices for student
leaders, the editorial staff of the
student publication and the
officers of other student
organizations.
Cavite State University- Trece Martires City Campus
